Banner.Description: As a seasoned full-stack developer and AI integration expert, I help entrepreneurs and businesses bring their innovative ideas to life. With 4 years of experience in full-stack development using technologies like React, Angular, Python, and FastAPI and 3 years of expertise in low-code development using platforms like Oracle APEX, and WordPress. I deliver scalable and efficient web applications. I rapidly prototype and deploy solutions using low code tools, enabling quick idea validation and product launch. Let's collaborate to build new web applications, and integrate AI capabilities.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 6+ years as a developer, I've continuously expanded my skill set. With 3+ years of full-stack experience, I've adeptly managed backend tasks using FastAPI and PostgreSQL, while Angular and React have been my go-to for crafting intuitive user interfaces. Concurrently, I've spent over 3 years mastering low-code development, seamlessly integrating AI into applications using platforms like Bubble.io, Wix, and WordPress. Oracle APEX has also been pivotal in building scalable, enterprise-grade solutions. Committed to ongoing learning, I embrace new challenges to drive impactful results in every project.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Angular Developer, Bubble IO Developer
Description: Develop user-facing features using Angular framework.
Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.
Optimize application performance and ensure responsiveness.
Collaborate with back-end developers and UI/UX designers to implement features.
Integrate Bubble.io functionality into web applications.
Customize Bubble.io workflows and plugins to meet project requirements.
Troubleshoot and debug issues in Angular and Bubble.io applications.
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices in Angular and Bubble.io development.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Angular Developer
Description: Develop user-friendly web applications with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), and TypeScript.
Collaborate with UX/UI designers to translate design mockups into responsive interfaces.
Use Angular to build scalable web applications.
Implement state management solutions like NgRx.
Integrate RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints for dynamic content.
Optimize applications for speed and scalability across devices and browsers.
Conduct code reviews and provide feedback for code quality.
Work with backend developers to define API contracts.
Implement automated testing suites to validate code.
Stay updated with frontend technologies and trends.
Participate in Agile processes for incremental software delivery.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web Designer
Description: Create visually appealing and user-friendly website designs based on client requirements and brand guidelines.
Collaborate with clients and stakeholders to understand project objectives and design preferences.
Produce wireframes, mockups, and prototypes to visualize design concepts and gather feedback.
Use tools such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketch, or Figma to design website layouts and components.
Ensure designs are responsive and optimized for various devices and screen sizes.
Work closely with frontend developers to implement designs using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Maintain consistency in design elements and visual style throughout the website.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Low Code Developer (Oracle APEX, Bubble IO, WordPress, Wix)
Description: Develop and customize web applications and websites using low-code platforms such as Oracle APEX, Bubble.io, WordPress, and Wix.
Work closely with clients to understand their requirements and translate them into functional and visually appealing solutions.
Utilize the features and functionalities of low-code platforms to rapidly prototype and deploy applications.
Customize themes, templates, and plugins to meet client specifications and branding guidelines.
Implement responsive design techniques to ensure optimal user experience across different devices and screen sizes.
Integrate third-party APIs and services to extend the functionality of web applications and websites.
Optimize performance and security of applications and websites, including database optimization, code refactoring, and security best practices.
Provide ongoing maintenance and support for deployed applications, including troubleshooting issues and implementing updates.
Stay up-to-date with the latest developments and best practices in low-code development and related technologies.
Communicate effectively with clients to gather requirements, provide progress updates, and address feedback.
Manage project timelines, budgets, and resources to ensure timely delivery of high-quality solutions.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I made
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: VFitter
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: VFitter lets educators design relevant curriculums that plug into high-demand roles. Learners prove competencies to employers through cutting-edge simulations. It's the efficient hiring ecosystem the world desperately needs.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Jadu
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A company that provides low-code Web Experience Management software. Jadu's software specializes in web CMS, forms, portal, and customer case management tools for enterprises. Jadu's platform is used by hundreds of local authorities and higher education institutions around the world

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Arm Bracket
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An online service that creates brackets and automates live table tournaments. The brackets can also be printed

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Veekel
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Veekel is the next-gen platform connecting car dealers and buyers on an intuitive and most advance car dealing and auctions platform.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Streambean
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A Platform that Host and schedule meetings, send email or sms, track leads and KPIs, make sales, and train better sales agents – oh, and connect your existing CRM.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Kay&Emms Web App
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A full fledge web app that is used to ease the customers, employees, and stake holders of KayandEmms

OtherProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Stable Books
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A web app to manage accountability

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Online Job Recruitment | Jobify
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Jobify strives to put job seekers first, giving them free access to search for jobs, post resumes, and research companies

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
